text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Client" means an individual who seeks employment through an employment agency.
"Commissioner" means the Commissioner of Labor and Industry.

section.section:
"Employment agency" means a person who, for a fee:
obtains, offers to obtain, or attempts to obtain:
provides to a client information to enable the client to obtain employment;
obtains, offers to obtain, or attempts to obtain employment or an engagement in connection with an entertainment, exhibition, or performance, including:
